If you're interested in exploring the darker side of online dating and human psychology, "Matched" is another great option. It's a modern-day comedy-thriller that offers an intriguing look into our deepest desires and vulnerabilities. Enjoy!

This suspenseful thriller follows Smilla, a half Inuit who investigates the mysterious death of a young Inuit boy, taking her on a journey to Greenland.
